57236.「む……。どうやら\n わしの出番が 来たようじゃな。: Hmm... I suppose it's my turn now, then.

57237.「久しいな <pc>よ。\n まさか お前が 勇者の盟友であったとは\n 世の中:
It's been some time, <pc>.
I never thought you'd end up being the Hero's
Ally.

57238.「わしは エイドス。\n 叡智の冠に名を連ねる 賢者のひとりよ。\n お前が 勇:
I am Sage Eidos of the Crown of Wisdom. And
you must be <pc>, the Hero's
Ally.

57239.「わしのあずかった秘技は 『勇者の盾』。\n 魔物の生み出す 幾多の災いから\n:
The skill I've been entrusted with is called
"Hero's Shield". It can protect anyone from
the attacks of monsters with a sacred light.

57240.「大魔王や その眷属と この秘技なしに\n 戦うことは 危険だと言えるじゃろう。:
It would be dangerous to fight against the
Demon Lord and his forces without this
skill.

57241.「しかし この秘技を会得したいのならば\n わしの与える 守護の試練を\n 果た:
But, if you wish to master it, you must
undergo the Trial of Protection.

57242.「お前は アンルシア姫とともに\n わしの用意した 試練の魔物を倒すのだ。\n:
You and Princess Anlucia must defeat the
monster in the trial I have prepared for
you. Will you accept?

57243.「<pc>。破邪の秘技の試練を\n エイドスさまから 受けたようね。:
Have you already accepted the Trial of
Protection from Sage Eidos?

57244.「エイドスさま。私は 必ずや\n <pc>とともに 試練を果たします。:
Together with <pc>, I will not fail
this trial.

57245.「……よろしい。プクランド大陸の\n ポーポラ地方の南東にある 賢者の隠れ家。\:
Very good. In the southwest area of Pukuland is the Popola Region. There you will find the Sage's Lair. The monster that lies in the back
of that cave will serve as your trial.

57246.「アンルシア姫。それに <pc>よ。\n 見事 試練の魔物を 打ち倒してみせるが:
Princess Anlucia, <pc>... Do your
best in vanquishing that monster.

57247.「<pc>は ひと足先に向かって。\n 私は ルシェンダさまに\n このことを伝:
<pc>, you can go on ahead.
I'll let Lushenda know about this, then
I'll be on my way.

57248.「……待て。お前は 多くの頼まれごとを\n 抱えているようではないか。:
...Hold on. It seems you've taken on too many
quests at the moment.

57249.「そのような状態では 試練など果たせまい。\n 他の頼まれごとを済ませてから\n:
You will not be able to complete the trial if
that's the case. Please come back once you've
completed your other quests.

57250.「なんと 受けぬというのか……。\n まあよい。受ける気になったら\n ふたたび:
What? You're not ready...? Well, that's fine.
If you decide you want to accept, come and ask
me again.

57251.「なんじゃ <pc>。\n 試練の内容を 忘れたというのではあるまいな？:
What is it? You haven't forgotten about the
trials, have you?

57252.「アンルシア姫に 加護の光にて 皆を守る\n 『勇者の盾』の秘技を 会得させるた:
For Anlucia to be able to protect everyone
with her sacred light, she must pass the Trial
of Protection and master the Hero's Shield.

57253.「<pc>は 勇者の盟友として\n アンルシア姫とともに\n わしの用意した 試:
<pc>. As the Ally of the Hero,
you must assist Anlucia in defeating the
monsters in the trial I have prepared.

57254.「プクランド大陸の ポーポラ地方の南東。\n 賢者の隠れ家に 向かえ。\n 試練:
Head to the Sage's Lair, in the southeast part of Pukuland in the Popola region. The monster in the back of the cave will serve as your
trial.

57255.「あれが 試練の魔物ね。\n なんだか ブキミな感じだわ……。:
That looks like the monster for the trial.
How ugly...

57258.「この魔物は 毒の煙を身にまとっているわ。\n 加護の光が守ってくれなければ\n:
It's spewing some kind of poisonous gas... if
it weren't for my Sacred Light, we'd have
been done for.

57259.「……もし この加護の光を 技に昇華できたら\n 毒から身を守りながら 戦うこと:
If I channel my Sacred Light into an attack,
I can fight while fending off the poison. Is
this the purpose of the Hero's Shield...?

57260.「<cs_pchero>！\n 私は 加護の光を 技に昇華することが\n できる:
<cs_pchero>! I'll find a way to
use my Sacred Light more effectively.

57261.「だから それまでの間 あなたには\n この魔物の相手を してほしいの！:
Until then, I'll need you to keep its
attention!

57264.「この魔物は 毒の煙を身にまとうわ。\n それに触れていると ダメージを受け続け:
The monster is shrouded in dangerous poison.
You'll get hurt if you stay too close, so
please be more careful!

57265.「私は 加護の光を 技に昇華することが\n できるかどうか 試してみるわ。\n:
I'll find a way to use my Sacred Light more
effectively. In the meantime, you deal with
that monster!

57268.「<cs_pchero> 大丈夫……？\n あなたにばかり 苦しい思いをさせて\:
Are you all right? I'm sorry I wasn't able
to adequately protect you...

57271.「よく聞いて <cs_pchero>。\n 加護の光を できるだけ 大きくして\:
Listen carefully. I'll channel my Sacred Light
as big as I can, and release it all around
me.

57285.「わかりました エイドスさま。\n 私は 必ず 大魔王の魔の手から\n 人々を:
I understand. I will do my best to protect
everyone from the Demon Lord's evil
schemes!

67737.「絶対に 加護の光を 技に昇華させて\n 『勇者の盾』を使いこなしてみせるわ。\:
I'll channel my Sacred Light and master the
Hero's Shield for sure! I won't let it hurt
you any longer!

67738.「……ああ。チカラを感じるわ。\n これが 誰かを守るために必要な\n 勇者のチ:
Yes, I can feel it... The power that a Hero
uses to protect...

67739.「その光の中に 入っていれば\n 毒のダメージを ふせげるはずよ。\n だから:
If you stay in that light, you should be able
to avoid any damage from the poison. Make
sure to stay close to me!

67741.「……はあ はあ。\n なんとか 試練の魔物を倒せたみたいね。:
*pant, pant*... Looks like we managed to
beat it.

67742.「これは……。私の中に\n 大きなチカラが わいてくる……。: I feel... a great power surging through me...

67743.どこからともなく 声が聞こえる……。: A voice was heard from out of nowhere...

67744.<center>アンルシア姫。それに <cs_pchero>よ。\nよくぞ 試練:
Well done, the both of you. You have
vanquished the monster of the trial.

67745.<center>アンルシア姫の 人を守ろうという\n強い意志を わしも感じた。\:
I, too, felt Princess Anlucia's strong desire
to protect others. You have both passed the
Trial of Protection.

67746.「感謝いたします エイドスさま。\n ですが 私は ただ <cs_pchero>:
Thank you very much, Sage Eidos. I only wanted
to protect <cs_pchero>...

67747.<center>……かまわぬ。それこそが\nこの守護の試練の 目的なのじゃからな:
Of course. That is the purpose of the Trial
of Protection.

67748.<center>誰かを必死に 守ろうとした その気持ち。\nこれからの戦いでも\:
That feeling of protecting the ones you care
about... Don't ever forget that in the future
hardships you will no doubt face.

67750.勇者姫アンルシアは 破邪の秘技のひとつ\n『勇者の盾』を 会得した！<me 71:
Anlucia has learned the "Hero's Shield",
one of the Sacred Skills! <me 71>

67751.<center>では 今一度 秘密会議室に戻るがよい。\nまだ 話し足りぬことが:
You may now return to the meeting room.
There is still more to discuss.

67752.「ありがとう <cs_pchero>。\n おかげで 破邪の秘技のひとつを会得で:
Thanks to you, I've learned one of the Sacred
Skills. Let's head back to the castle.

67753.「……アンルシア姫よ。魔を討つための\n 破邪の秘技の中に 『勇者の盾』という\:
Anlucia... do you know why the Hero's
Shield exists as a Sacred Skill?

67754.「勇者は 魔を滅ぼすためだけの存在ではない。\n 人々を 魔から守ることも 重要:
It's not only used to defeat monsters, but to
protect people from them, too. That is the
purpose of the Hero's Shield.

67755.「よし。これで 守護の試練は終わるが\n 勇者の盟友 <pc>の働きにも\n 報:
Good. This ends the Trial of Protection.
We must also reward you too,
<pc>.

67756.「わしから 報酬を用意してある。\n ミルト。よろしく 頼む。: I have a reward for you. Milt, come here.

67758.「では わしは 失礼する。\n ふたりとも 本当に ご苦労じゃった。:
Now, if you'll excuse me. Thank you both for
your hard work.

93266.「ポーポラ地方へは オルフェアの町から\n オルフェア地方東へ出て 東へ進めば\:
The Popola Region can be reached by leaving
Orphea from the east and continuing in that
direction.

93267.「ポーポラ地方へは オルフェアの町から\n オルフェア地方東へ出て 東へ進めばよ:
To get to the Popola Region, just head east
out of Orphea and keep going. If you
understand, please go as soon as possible.
